name: INNOVATIVE FEDERAL STRATEGIES ON BEHALF OF ITS CLIENTS
sampleDescriptions: H.R.   /S.   Agriculture/FARM bill, any title, all provisions relating to agricultural imagery modernization (on behalf of Esri).
H.R. 6237 /S.   Intelligence Authorization Act, 2019, all provisions relating to high performance computing (on behalf of Cray)and geospatial mapping and analysis(on behalf of Esri).

H.R. 5155/S.2987, National Defense Authorization Act, 2019, Title I, all provisions relating to Navy shipbuilding (on behalf of Austal USA), specialized commercial vehicles and chemical-biological war
